DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the safety and efficacy of USL-221 to placebo for postmenopausal patients.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate Divigel for the Treatment of Postmenoupausal Symptoms
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal women Have moderate to severe hot flashes Normal Pap Smear Abnormal mammogram Abnormal clinical breast exam BMI >35
